text: "I Ain't Gonna Stand for It" is a 1980 song by Stevie Wonder and is the second single from his 19th studio album Hotter than July. It went to number 11 in the United States, number 10 in the United Kingdom, number 50 in Germany, number 29 in the Netherlands, number 9 in Canada, number 2 in New Zealand and number 61 in Australia. It was covered by Eric Clapton in 2001 as the leading single from his 14th studio album Reptile and went to number 63 in Switzerland. ==References== Category:1980 songs Category:Pop rock songs Category:Soul songs Category:Stevie Wonder songs Category:Eric Clapton songs
title: I Ain't Gonna Stand for It
